title: FreeSpace
author: VD
content_html: If you’re a FreeSpace player, have a look at the layout and let us know if you’ve got any suggestions for improvements to the FreeSpace mode. Thanks to IW of the Ilk for contributing it.
content_text:
If you’re a FreeSpace player, have a look at the layout and let us know if you’ve got any suggestions for improvements to
the FreeSpace mode
.  Thanks to IW of the Ilk for contributing it.
